SEARCH
Package com.tangosol.net.events.partition.cache

Interface CacheLifecycleEvent

All Superinterfaces:
Event<CacheLifecycleEvent.Type>
public interface CacheLifecycleEvent extends Event<CacheLifecycleEvent.Type>
A CacheLifecycleEvent allows subscribers to capture events pertaining to the lifecycle of a cache.
Since:
12.2.1
Author:
bbc 2015.09.01
